title: AI toys spark fierce debate over child development and privacy
content: The global smart toy market is expanding rapidly, growing from $14.11 billion in 2022 to a projected $35 billion by 2027. Critics warn that AI toys, which build relationships through personalized conversation, pose a threat to children’s emotional development…

title: The Top 100 Gen AI Consumer Apps - 5th Edition | Andreessen Horowitz
content: Which AI apps are people actively using? What’s actually making money, beyond being popular? We analyzed the data.

title: Are people’s bosses really making them use AI tools? - Piccalilli
content: Andy Bell had heard companies were forcing employees to use AI tools so spoke to developers to determine if that was the case and learned some horrors in the process.

title: halo-video added to PyPI
content: Interactive CLI for YouTube video analysis with audio transcription and visual frame analysis using Gemini AI

title: Meta In Talks With Google And OpenAI To Integrate AI Models As Hyperion Data Center Faces $5 Billion Cost Backlash: Report
content: Meta Platforms Inc. (NASDAQ:META) is reportedly in talks with Alphabet Inc.'s (NASDAQ:GOOG) (NASDAQ:GOOGL) Google and ChatGPT-parent OpenAI to integrate their artificial intelligence models into its apps, as the company faces scrutiny over its multibillion-do…

title: manifoldbot 0.2.5
content: A self-contained Python module for creating intelligent trading bots that monitor data sources, analyze content with ChatGPT, and automatically trade on Manifold Markets

title: Meta's AI leaders discuss using Google, OpenAI models in apps, The Information says
content: “Leaders at Meta’s new AI organization, Meta Superintelligence Labs, have explored integrating Google’s Gemini model to deliver conversational, text-based responses for queries submitted to company’s primary chatbot”

title: Why is the second-most-popular app in the US controversial?
content: Experts have raised concerns that women-only app Tea deepens gender divides and fosters a culture of surveillance and mistrust.

title: Adrian Weckler: Teenagers are starting to die when using AI
content: What seemed inevitable is now happening. Teenagers are starting to die when using AI. This week, the world has been shocked from the case of a young man who turned to ChatGPT for companionship and then killed himself.

title: The scary downside of artificial intelligence
content: The dawning of the age of artificial intelligence has brought along with it foreboding in some circles that machines will displace mankind. This foreboding generally takes the form of fear that machines will replace remunerative human labor, includin...
